article_title: My Arch Story project asks St. Louisans to share memories
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

(KTVI) - When you look at the St. Louis skyline, the image of the Gateway Arch is unmistakably St. Louis. The Arch is the symbol of this city and also an iconic architectural site.

Now is your chance to express what you think about the Arch with a new project called the "My Arch Story" project.

Fox 2 discusses the project with Ryan McClure from City Arch River.

For more information about the project, visit cityarchriver/myarchstory.
